entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Thunder Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:24 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 2:00 PM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 65 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -12.6°C
Wind: E 20 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 11 March 2023
